task.title: Search for YouTube Content
task.shortdesc: Use Social Search to search for YouTube content to include in your Asset Library or publish to Apps.

step.cmd: Select YouTube to search YouTube content.
Enter a keyword and click return.
Click Show Filter to refine your search.

ul.li: Sort By: allows you to select whether to sort returned results by Relevance, Recently Added, Views, Rating or Title.
Quality: allows you to limit returned videos to ones in High Definition (HD).
Duration: allows you to limit returned videos that those with a duration of <4 mins, 4 mins- 20 mins, or >20 mins.
License: allows you to limit returned videos based on Any license, Creative Commons or YouTube Standard License.
